title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 4 ยง 211.2 - Issuance of subpoenas
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 4 ยง 211.2 - Issuance of subpoenas

State Regulations

All agency subpoenas shall be issued at the discretion of the
presiding administrative law judge or other presiding officer or agent of the
board (hereafter referred to as the administrative law judge). The
administrative law judge may grant or deny any subpoena request in whole or in
part. Requests for a subpoena filed within 10 working days of a scheduled
hearing date will not be considered absent good cause shown by the party
requesting the subpoena. Notes

York State Register August 2, 2017/Volume XXXIX, Issue 31, eff. 8/2/2017

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
